description: Information to enhance [Vetur](https://github.com/vuejs/vetur)'s auto completion for [Gridsome](https://github.com/gridsome/gridsome).
name: gridsome-helper-json

scripts.release:major: changelog -M -u $npm_package_config_changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'docs(CHANGELOG.md): :bookmark: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major -m 'feat: :tada: updated version' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m -u $npm_package_config_changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'docs(CHANGELOG.md): :bookmark: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor -m 'feat: :tada: updated version' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -u $npm_package_config_changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'docs(CHANGELOG.md): :bookmark: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch -m 'feat: :tada: updated version' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
